title: Mr. 2 Arrives at Level 5
description: Bentham (Mr. 2), disguised as Hannyabal, arrives at Level 5 with the unconscious and severely poisoned Luffy. He searches for a way to cure Luffy's deadly poisoning from Magellan.
significance: Sets up the search for Emporio Ivankov, establishing the episode's main quest to save Luffy's life.

title: Buggy and Galdino Encounter Army Wolves
description: Buggy and Galdino (Mr. 3) attempt to escape through Level 5's frozen wasteland but are continually hunted by the Army Wolves. They try to defend themselves using Galdino's wax abilities to create a bunker, but the wolves prove too cunning.
significance: Provides comic relief while demonstrating the dangers of Level 5's Army Wolves and the harsh environment prisoners face.

title: Mr. 2 Breaks Luffy Out of His Cell
description: Bentham finds Luffy imprisoned in a cell on Level 5 and decides to break him free despite the risks. He carries the unconscious Luffy across the frozen wasteland in search of Emporio Ivankov.
significance: Demonstrates Mr. 2's unwavering loyalty and friendship to Luffy, willing to risk everything to save his friend's life.

title: Army Wolves Attack Luffy and Mr. 2
description: While crossing Level 5's frozen terrain, Luffy and Bentham are attacked by a pack of Army Wolves. Bentham tries to fight them off but is quickly overwhelmed by the vicious predators.
significance: Creates the desperate situation that triggers Luffy's unconscious use of Haki and leads to their rescue by Inazuma.

title: Luffy's Unconscious Haki Display
description: Despite being severely poisoned and barely conscious, Luffy unleashes an angry outburst of Conqueror's Haki that knocks out all the attacking Army Wolves. This happens instinctively as he tries to protect Bentham.
significance: Marks an important early display of Luffy's latent Conqueror's Haki (Haoshoku Haki) ability, foreshadowing his future mastery of this rare power. This is one of the first clear demonstrations of this ability since Amazon Lily.

quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy's angry shout as he unleashes his Haki against the wolves

title: Inazuma's Debut
description: A mysterious figure dressed in orange and white with a distinctive lightning bolt scar over their right eye appears before the unconscious Luffy and Bentham. This person, holding a glass of wine, is Inazuma, a Revolutionary Army officer.
significance: Introduces Inazuma, who will play a crucial role in the Impel Down breakout and later proves to be an important member of the Revolutionary Army under Dragon.

title: Arrival at Level 5.5 - New Kama Land
description: Luffy and Bentham awaken in an unexpected location - a hidden paradise between Level 5 and Level 6 called Level 5.5 or New Kama Land. This secret sanctuary is filled with okama (cross-dressers), music, food, and celebration, completely unknown to Impel Down's guards.
significance: Reveals the existence of a secret level in Impel Down that has existed for over 100 years, created by prisoners to escape the prison's horrors. This becomes a crucial base for the eventual prison break.

title: Emporio Ivankov's Grand Entrance
description: Bentham awakens at a lively party in New Kama Land. A large man with a massive purple afro, wearing theatrical feminine clothing and a queen's crown atop a king's crown, appears on stage. This is Emporio Ivankov, the legendary 'Miracle Person' and Queen of the Kamabakka Kingdom, whom Bentham has been desperately seeking.
significance: Introduces one of the most important characters in the Summit War Saga. Ivankov's hormone powers can potentially save Luffy, and as a Revolutionary Army commander, his involvement sets up major future storylines including connections to Dragon and the Revolutionary Army.

quotes.text: Welcome to the paradise of Level 5.5, The New Kama Land!
quotes.speaker: Emporio Ivankov
quotes.context: Ivankov's first words as he welcomes Bentham to the hidden sanctuary

title: Revelation of New Kama Land's History
description: Ivankov explains that Level 5.5 was created long ago by a prisoner with digging abilities (later revealed to be created by someone with the Push-Push Fruit over 100 years ago). The hidden level has secret passageways to every level above it, allowing them to rescue prisoners that Impel Down believes were 'demoned away'.
significance: Expands One Piece world-building by revealing that Impel Down, supposedly the world's most secure prison, has a massive blind spot that has existed for over a century. Also establishes a safe haven for marginalized individuals.

title: Introduction of New Kama Land Residents
description: Various residents of New Kama Land are shown celebrating, including Francois, Tsunokkov, and Usakkov. These characters are members of the Newkama community living in the hidden paradise.
significance: Establishes the community of New Kama Land and the diverse group of individuals who have found refuge there.

title: Bentham Recognizes Ivankov
description: Bentham realizes that the flamboyant figure before him is Emporio Ivankov, the former Queen of the Kamabakka Kingdom and the legendary 'Okama King' he has been searching for to save Luffy's life.
significance: Establishes the connection between Bentham and Ivankov's shared okama culture, and confirms that the person who might save Luffy has been found.
